name: Terminal Velocity (itch) (Finlay)
description:
Created in my 3rd year of Multimedia Development using Adobe Flash, Illustrator and Audacity.  Competely hand coded - there are a couple of bugs. Shoot asteroids and avoid blackholes. Try and beat 100 points without cheating!

  • WASD for 4 directional movement
  • Space to Shoot
  • Move the mouse to aim the laser for the orange ship

Local highscores work.
